long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Timer Chrome Extension, the perfect productivity tool for anyone who spends long hours in front of their computer. With this extension, you can easily track your work time and take regular breaks to prevent burnout.

Simply download the Timer Chrome Extension from the Chrome Web Store, and the timer will automatically start when you open the extension. The time is displayed on the extension icon, so you can easily keep track of how long you've been working.

In addition to tracking your time, the Timer Chrome Extension also reminds you to take a break every 30 minutes, helping you stay focused and productive throughout the day. You can customize the length of your breaks to suit your needs, and the extension will even notify you when it's time to get back to work.

The Timer Chrome Extension is easy to use and highly customizable, making it the perfect tool for anyone who wants to work smarter, not harder. Try it out today and start boosting your productivity!

***Update 2.4.1***

1.Ensure that the countdown timer on the icon continues to operate normally after the popup window is closed.
2.The countdown timer will no longer be reset to zero when the popup window is reopened.
3.The user interface has been updated :)
If you are using our countdown timer extension, please make sure to install the latest version for a better user experience. If you have any questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to contact our support team.

你是否經常在電腦前工作或學習而忘記休息呢？使用這個 Chrome 擴充功能，可以有效幫助你管理工作時間並提醒你該休息了。當你啟動這個擴充功能時，它會開始記錄時間，並在擴充功能圖示上顯示過去的時間。此外，它還會每 30 分鐘提醒你該休息一下，讓你可以適時放鬆眼睛和肩膀，保持健康。現在就來下載這個實用的擴充功能吧！

***2.4.1更新***
1.確保在彈出視窗被關閉後，icon上的倒數計時仍會正常運作
2.彈出視窗重新開啟時，現在已經不會再將倒數計時重置為零
3.使用者介面已經更新:)
如果您使用的是我們的倒數計時擴充套件，請確保在使用時已安裝最新版本，以享受更好的使用體驗。如果您有任何疑問或需要協助，請隨時聯繫我們的支援團隊。
